Articles.Content: Hi guys, I am FirstSecondThird, I chose the name because it sounds cool to me. I am sort of experienced with flight-sims, because I had FSX, Microsoft Flight Simulator for DOS or something like that. Some people called me a noob when I had Flight Simulator X, because I didn't know how to work the orbit controls when flying Space Shuttles. These are my weaknesses when It comes to working rockets in orbit/take off. Spaceplanes I definitely understand, because the controls are somewhat familiar. I plan on making mods for Kerbal Space Program, like something that, when traveling at Mach 1 or higher, the navball will display Mach [Any Number from 1-4]. Please do not dislike the mods I have up for display, because I am new to this.

WElcome to the forums and it seems you already have a good basis. I will warn you that Stock Aerodynamics are not like real world aero dynamics and I point you towards Ferram Aerospace Research to change that. (So that it's a little more like FSX)
FAR is definitely the place to be when you're into realistic flight. Welcome to the forums FirstSecondThird!

Thank you, Truly!

[Evil grin as I hope to kill kerbals]
